QuestData.Title: Felborne No More
QuestData.Description: The Felborne have begun to expand their grasp beyond the city's reach. A camp to the east in the Crimson Thicket is of a particular interest to us. Their outpost leader, Valthis Ama'ran, serves Andaris directly.$B$BNow is the time to put our withered training and Oculeth's device to the test. We cannot allow them to advance any further, $n.$B$BHead for the camp and use the orb to sever the head of the beast. The time has come to begin our advance.
QuestData.LogDescription: Slay $2oa Felborne and their leader, Valthis Ama'ran, at the Felborne Outpost in Crimson Thicket.
QuestData.RewardText: Our efforts have proven quite successful. I believe we are just about ready to make our stand.
